text: Hilda Kristina “Kirsti” Suonio, née Sainio, originally Kjäll (1872–1939) was a Finnish stage and film actress.Kääpä, p. 203. ==Selected filmography== * The Village Shoemakers (1923) * Substitute Wife (1936) == References == == Bibliography == * Kääpä, Pietari: Directory of World Cinema: Finland. title: Kirsti Suonio
